Which bit in the DWORD do you want to know its level

InterfaceAsPlainText.xhtml: FUNCTION F_ReturnBitInDword : BOOL VAR_INPUT inDword : DWORD;// The DWORD you wnat to inspect for bit level inIndex : UINT;// Which bit in the DWORD do you want to know its level END_VAR VAR END_VAR
